    Methods in mars.mips.hardware with parameters of type Register
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    Coprocessor0.getRegisterPosition(Register register)
    Coprocessor0 implements only selected registers, so the register number (8, 12, 13, 14) does not correspond to its position in the list of registers (0, 1, 2, 3).
